I would swap bodies with an animal that can swim under water. This way I can discover new  aquatic life and learn more about the oceans  and seas.
I would swap bodies with an animal that can survive in extreme hot or cold temperatures. This  way I can learn more about different climates  and weather patterns.
I would swap bodies with an animal  that can see in the dark. This way I can  explore dark caves and underground tunnels.
I would swap bodies with an animal  that can see in slow motion. This way I can  learn more about how animals perceive the  world around them.
I would swap bodies with an animal  that can heal itself quickly. This way  I can discover new ways to heal human injuries  and diseases.
